original_title: The Columbine Cause - An Examination of the April 20 1999 Attack on Columbine High School
overview: Evan Long's "The Columbine Cause" is a feature-length video presentation based on public domain government records related to the official "investigation" of the Columbine High School shootings of April 20, 1999. It includes quotations from suspect interrogations and witness interviews as recorded in little before publicized police files, 911 recordings and other rare items.
title: The Columbine Cause - An Examination of the April 20 1999 Attack on Columbine High School
